attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With BSA polls now finding atheism hurtling towards the majority and Christianity already falling below 50%, surely it is time to put an end to the relic of English state religion.

England is one of four developed countries to have a state religion. Christianity no longer holds any sort of special place in English society, and its majority is being rapidly eroded by atheism. Why does a secular society need a state religion?
